      • bookRoom

        public boolean bookRoom​(int roomNumber,
                        int personN)
        This method will be used to book the room
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - is number that wanted to booked
        personN - is number of person stays in the room
        Returns:
        true if booking the room process is successful. It may already booked or room number may not be available

      • cancelReservation

        public boolean cancelReservation​(int roomNum)
        This method will be used for canceling the reservation
        Parameters:
        roomNum - room number of which room will be canceled if there is more than one reserved room.
        Returns:
        true if process is successfull, if there is a room which reserved for the guest.
